summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Discord Radio Bot repository optimization (Iteration 3). All dynamic bot features, German umlauts, UI updates, and bot avatar images tested successfully.
passed_tests: Backend /api/bots returns dynamic bots with avatar_url pointing to /img/bot-N.png
Backend /api/stations returns exactly 11 stations with correct genres
Backend /api/stats returns correct stats including bot and station counts
Backend /api/commands returns commands with proper German umlauts
Frontend Hero section displays correct German umlauts: Lautstärke, Wähle, genieße
Frontend Bot cards display custom bot images (not just SVG icons)
Frontend Bot directory title shows 'Unsere Radio Bots'
Frontend Bot card description contains 'Lade so viele ein wie du möchtest'
Frontend Features section 6th feature is 'Unbegrenzt skalierbar' (NOT 'Flexibel konfigurierbar')
Frontend Features section contains all 6 features with proper German umlauts
Frontend Station browser shows proper umlauts: 'verfügbare Stationen'
Frontend Commands section contains proper umlauts: 'verlässt', 'verfügbaren', 'Lautstärke'
Frontend Footer shows 'ZUHÖRER' with proper ö umlaut
Bot invite buttons have proper Discord OAuth2 URLs with client_id parameters
